titleStmt.title: Two memorials delivered this instant January by Mr. Sydney, His Majesty of Great Britains envoy extraordinary residing at the Hague to the States General of the United Provinces to induce their Lordships not to enter into a league defensive with the French king : together with the reasons delivered to the States-General by the French ambassador ... for their entring into such defensive leagues as by his master the French king is desired and prest for ...
titleStmt.author: Romney, Henry Sidney, Earl of, 1641-1704.

titleStmt.title: Two memorials delivered this instant January by Mr. Sydney, His Majesty of Great Britains envoy extraordinary residing at the Hague to the States General of the United Provinces to induce their Lordships not to enter into a league defensive with the French king : together with the reasons delivered to the States-General by the French ambassador ... for their entring into such defensive leagues as by his master the French king is desired and prest for ...
titleStmt.author: Romney, Henry Sidney, Earl of, 1641-1704.

notesStmt.note: This item appears at reel 1339:23 as Wing R1912, and at reel 512:26 as Wing S3759 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
